body_text:
# functions to show an image def imshow(img): img = img / 2 + 0.5  # unnormalize npimg = img.numpy() plt.imshow(np.transpose(npimg, (1, 2, 0))) plt.show()

body:
`# functions to show an image
    def imshow(img):
        img = img / 2 + 0.5  # unnormalize
        npimg = img.numpy()
        plt.imshow(np.transpose(npimg, (1, 2, 0)))
        plt.show()`
you have to add the plt.show method
